aka: 卡塔莲娜路德——马丁路德身边的女人

writer.name: 克里斯蒂安·施纳克 Christian Schnalke

director.name: 朱丽亚·冯·海因茨 Julia von Heinz

trans_title: 卡塔莲娜路德——马丁路德身边的女人
introduction: 卡塔蓮娜·馮·博拉自少已被認定，她的一生將要成為修女。於二十多歲時，她閱讀了馬丁路德的著作從此被啓發出新的思考模式。她逃出修道院，沒有立法身份地走到威登堡，沒有收入，更被家人避開。在威登堡，她遇上了馬丁路德。她決定要與馬丁路德結婚，成為照顧他的日常的妻子，成為同樣地受爭議的人物，也成為孩子的媽媽。他們共同面對公眾丟評擊與種種危機。最年長的女兒馬特蓮娜之更是他們倆關係的重要關口。當卡塔蓮娜再次發現她的勇氣所在，她找到了回到生命的路。Katharina von Bora lives the life that was meant for her as a nun. In her early twenties she reads Martin Luther’s work and discovers a whole new way of thinking. She escapes with some of her fellow nuns from the cloister, reaches Wittenberg without legal position, without income, and shunned by her family. In Wittenberg, she meets Martin Luther. Katharina decides to marry the reformer and as his wife becomes the respected “manager” of his vast household, an equal conversational partner and mother to their children. Together they face public and crises in their life. The death of their oldest daughter Magdalena tests their relationship. Only when Katharina rediscovers her courage she finds her way back into life.
